docs.snippet: Venezuela will shrink the size of the U.S. Embassy staff, limit the activities of U.S. diplomats and require American citizens to apply for visas if they want to come bask on the beach....
docs.lead_paragraph: Venezuela will shrink the size of the U.S. Embassy staff, limit the activities of U.S. diplomats and require American citizens to apply for visas if they want to come bask on the beach.

headline.main: Venezuela to Shrink US Embassy Staff, Require Tourist Visas
headline.print_headline: Venezuela to Shrink US Embassy Staff, Require Tourist Visas

docs.snippet: The irresistibly distinct, coldblooded and cerebral Mr. Spock was something new and long-lasting....
docs.lead_paragraph: The irresistibly distinct, coldblooded and cerebral Mr. Spock was something new and long-lasting.
docs.abstract: Alessandra Stanley An Appraisal column reflects on cultural pervasiveness of Star Trek character Spock, noting that actor Leonard Nimoy was never able to move beyond that role in public perception.

headline.main: For Leonard Nimoy, Spock’s Hold Made Reaching Escape Velocity Futile
headline.print_headline: Mr. Spock Had a Hold on Him, and Us

docs.snippet: Kelly Renee Gissendaner’s religious conversion in a Georgia prison, where she is scheduled for execution on Monday, has led many people to ask that her life be spared....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kelly Renee Gissendaner’s religious conversion in a Georgia prison, where she is scheduled for execution on Monday, has led many people to ask that her life be spared.
docs.abstract: Mark Oppenheimer Beliefs column notes that death row inmate Kelly Renee Gissendaner, who found God while in prison, has become pen pals with one of world's most prominent theologians, Jurgen Moltmann.

headline.main: A Death Row Inmate Finds Common Ground With Theologians
headline.print_headline: A Death Row Inmate Finds Common Ground With Theologians
